snippet: Robert Schwartzman’s understated sex comedy, his first feature, is a bittersweet study of a man who hasn’t yet taken control of his life....
abstract: Neil Genzlinger reviews movie Dreamland, directed by Robert Schwartzman and starring Johnny Simmons and Amy Landecker.
lead_paragraph: Robert Schwartzman’s understated sex comedy, his first feature, is a bittersweet study of a man who hasn’t yet taken control of his life.

headline.main: Review: A Pianist Adrift Encounters a Cougar in ‘Dreamland’
headline.print_headline: Review: A Pianist Adrift Encounters a Cougar in ‘Dreamland’
